reason: Bitcoin has slipped below key support ($88,000) amid significant macroeconomic uncertainties including government shutdown risk and the highly anticipated Fed rate decision, which historically introduces high volatility. This confluence of factors suggests potential for continued downward price movement and heightened market risk. Altcoins (XRP) are also showing immediate weakness.
